name: CALCULATOR (Boss Fight)
description:
Description

My 3rd game! It's a 2d Boss Fight game. You have to avoid the boss's numbers. But you can touch the calculator himself.  Your HP bar is at the bottom-right. There is a timer in the top-left corner. Survive as long as you can.

Controls

WASD/arrow keys - Move

Credits

Music by Toby Fox (Undertale and Deltarune) https://undertale.com/  / https://www.deltarune.com/

Everything else by: me (I don't have a team)

Changelog

-The Score is shown when you lose

-Added Highscore

Good Luck :D
